```bash
sudo sed -i "s/listen_addresses = 'localhost,100.110.82.181'/listen_addresses = '*'/" /etc/postgresql/18/main/postgresql.conf && sudo systemctl restart postgresql@18-main.service && sleep 2 && PGPASSWORD=wolflogic2024 psql -h localhost -p 5433 -U wolf -d wolf_logic -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memories;"
```

Once that's up, I'll get PostgREST installed - it'll give you a REST API directly to the Librarian without needing custom code.
